entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
